Extremely professional, friendly, and amazing, well-put-together lectures. He knows how to lecture without only reading what he has on his slides.

He has a policy that restricts electronics use for note-taking, this was annoying at first but led to a very interactive and attentive environment during lectures. A definite positive.

This professor is one of the best professors you can get. Very professional, clean, reasonable, and passionate. He understands the structure of his lecture and class very clearly and teaches things in an intriguing way with great tips and lessons on how you can keep handling academic writing or study in the future as well.

Genuinely wonderful. So funny & memorable. I can't recommend him enough. He made the online format SO doable: omitting some assignments, making tutorials asynchronous, giving clear learning aids, etc. While he does assign a lot of readings, they're truly enlightening, and he explains them in class. Just 1 short non-research paper & 2 easy MC exams.

HE IS THE BEST. If you haven't taken the class CA 136 yet, please do it. It's worth it. He is so passionate about his work and he explains everything so clearly. Not to mention he is very chill and funny. I took this course online during COVID and even though it was online it was still one of my favourite classes this semester. Should be mandatory.
